chk - Variable in class scar.StorageTask
 
Chunk - Class in scar
Chunk stores all the data and information related to a chunk during GetFile/StoreFile for use in Downloading/Uploading the chunk itself and for reassembly information during RS decode
Chunk(byte[], byte[], int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class scar.Chunk
 
ChunkMeta - Class in scar
ChunkMeta[] is the output of StoreFile and input to GetFile This stores meta data about each chunk associated with the file short of the actual position in the hashchain which is later calculated with the key during that actual process.
ChunkMeta(String, int, int) - Constructor for class scar.ChunkMeta

encrypt(byte[], byte[]) - Method in class scar.Encryption
encrypts the given plainText with our key via AES-GCM key = 32 bytes Output Format: _________________ | 16-byte IV | |-----------------| | encrypted data | |-----------------| | 16-byte MAC | |_________________|
encrypt(byte[], String) - Method in class scar.NoEncryption
 
Encryption - Class in scar
Encryption handles both the encryption and decryption of files in the SCAR system this is done via Spongy Castle using AES-GCM 256
Encryption() - Constructor for class scar.Encryption
